channel.title: CVE Feed for web2py -- web2py
channel.description: The latest CVEs for web2py -- web2py

item.title: CVE-2023-45158|2023-10-16T07:53:52.134Z -- web2py -- web2py
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in web2py 2.24.1 and earlier. When the product is configured to use notifySendHandler for logging (not the default configuration), a crafted web request may execute an arbitrary OS command on the web server using the product.
